description.des1: In this project, I used client-side, server-side, and database....

description.des2: Developed a dashboard for normal and admin users for different services

description.des3: For any service, a user must login and he will be able to give reviews

description.des4: An admin can add, delete or update any service and make an admin

description.des5: for client site designed i used Material-UI, react,firebase-authenticationFor back-end site Node.js, express.js, and MongoDB. Deploy in Heroku and firebase.

description.des1: A user selects any service and goes to the order placed for full details.

description.des2: Users must login to order a service and redirect them to the previous page.

description.des3: The user will be able to see all his orders and delete them if he wants.

description.des4: A simple admin can see all the orders and he can add any service.

description.des5: Implemented this project react,react-bootstrap,react-router , react-hook-form , firebase-authentication ,Node.js and express.js. MongoDB is used for the database.

description.des1: The project has been designed using only front-end technology-based.

description.des2: If the user clicks on any service then full details will be shown.

description.des3: Users will have to login for a service and be redirected to an appointment.

description.des4: A user will be able to see his appointment, news medicine details.

description.des5: The technology is used to react ,react-bootstrap ,react-router ,firebase- authentication systems.
